Module org.tquadrat.foundation.config
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.config

Interface PreferencesBean

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigBeanBase, ConfigBeanSpec, PreferencesBeanSpec
@Deprecated(since="0.1.0", forRemoval=true) @ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: PreferencesBean.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $") @API(status=DEPRECATED, since="0.0.1") public interface PreferencesBean extends ConfigBeanBase, PreferencesBeanSpec
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
Replaced by PreferencesBeanSpec.
When a configuration bean should be connected with Preferences, the respective specification interface needs to extend this interface.
